Projects

Tor For Windows

https://gitlab.com/antisec/torforwindows

This project allows you to easily use the TOR software + Bridges on your Ms-Windows!

TOR is a free project that uses Onion Routing technique¬†for anonymous communication over a computer network, that helps you to protect your anonymity while using the Internet. Of course, the TOR is not a Proxy or VPN! But, actually ‚Ä¶ as a secure Proxy, The TOR Network is more secure than every Public Proxy or VPN.

However, sometimes I have to use Ms-Windows, and so I‚Äôve prepare the TorForWindows for Windows using the official bundle of the TOR Project and another software packages such as: Privoxy and obfs4.

Conky_Digilog

This conky allows you to better monitor storage, bandwidth and resources in your GNU/Linux.

A plethora of OS stats (uname, uptime, CPU usage,mem usage, disk usage, ‚Äútop‚Äù like process stats, and network monitoring, just to name a few). Built-in Cairo for arbitrary drawing Circle with (Lua more). Runs on GNU/Linux, FreeBSD, OpenBSD, DragonFlyBSD, NetBSD, Solaris, Haiku OS, and macOS! and much more.
